explanation: The stage direction describes the setting of the scene, specifying that it is the boudoir of the Comtesse and includes details about the layout, such as the small paravent. This aligns with the definition of setting, which pertains to stage description or play location.
stgdir: La scène représente le boudoir de la Comtesse. À gauche, un petit paravent. Au lever du rideau, la Comtesse de La Roche-Gaston est seule en scène.
